Talk_20: <sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! I didn't think anybody else was here.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hm? Oh, are you from outside?<sp:0:4:0>If you wanna play, tell my brother, Nebb!
I'm sure he'll add you to our spy game!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm gonna go play spies with my brother,
Nebb, now!<sp:0:4:0>Us agents meet up at <clr:0000>school <clr:ffff>every
morning, since Nebb wants to go
to school.<sp:0:4:0>Me and Nebb still aren't old enough to
go to school yet though.<sp:0:4:0>But all of my friends are taking classes!
I wanna study tooooo!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It started raining, so me and the others
are hiding from the rain in the classroom.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I don't really care about the rain. My brother, Nebb,
just wanted to see the classroom up close.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Every day we meet up at <clr:0000>school<clr:ffff> before
playing spies!<sp:0:4:0>Me and my brother, Nebb, can't take
classes yet, so we're only allowed on
the playground right now.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Morning! A spy's job in the morning is to
get out of bed without fussing!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Um, I'm in the middle of playing spies
now! My job's to investigate the village!<sp:0:4:0>I start at the <clr:0000>school<clr:ffff>, then pass in front of
the old mayor Reede's house.<sp:0:4:0>After that, I go by the Ton Pu Inn, <sp:5:0:0>then
<clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff> on top of the hill!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>I'd better get going. I don't want spy
number one to yell at me!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hellooo! The rule if you're a spy is that
you have to run a lot!
Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>The junior spy is sleepy now. G'night!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm working on Sir Vaylence stuff for
A-Zoom right now! Wanna do it with me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Who's Sir Vaylence? <sp:5:1:0>Um...they're...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS>I forgot!<sp:0:4:0>I'll ask my brother. <sp:5:1:0>I mean, spy
number one!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's raining. That's the best time for
splashing around!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>My brother, Nebb, is spy number one.
Aaand I'm number two!<sp:0:4:0>A spy's job is to keep an eye out and
report to the big-time hero, A-Zoom, with
Sir Vaylence about any bad people.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>But the <clr:0000>lab <clr:ffff>on top of the hill to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>
is too far, so I can't go there.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm finished playing spies for today.
If you wanna play, we're gonna go
again tomorrow.<sp:0:4:0>We meet up at the <clr:0000>school<clr:ffff> in the morning.
Don't be late!
